resources.string: The phone must be connected to the watch, connect the watch and try again
The version of the watch is too old, update the watch to the latest version
Please try again after connecting the phone to the network
The hotspot connection with the watch does not work. Try again.
If you do not enable all the required permissions, the app may not work properly
Click on the screen to retry
A new update is available for download. Go to the Facebook page or the website to download it.
App modified by edotassi with valuable tips from John BNC
- Notification management with last message from Whatsapp
- Compatible with both US and Chinese versions
- Added Italian official Facebook group link
- Edit the photos in the Login page
- Added individual notifications on the watch
- Notifications on the watch are deleted (almost all)
- Replaced Chinese maps with Google ones
- Added the ability to enable / disable RTL support (requires full reboot of the app)
- Updated app based on version 2.2 Chinese
- Updated base app to Chinese version 2.3
- Added more options to Notifications settings
- Added Telegram channel link for updates
- Added link to the project on Github
- Restored original icons of the track start / end markers
By default notifications of ROM updates are blocked, if you want to receive them on the watch enable this option
Restart the app to apply the changes
Disable changes to the notification service, the app will handle notifications like the original one
By default the support for RTL languages (from right to left) is disabled
This setting requires you to kill the app
It also hides the additional update notice present only in the app, if you don\'t want to receive any notification enable this option
Enable the filter for double notifications
Enable the custom filter for each app
The custom watch faces store will be disabled (https://sawfb.fabiobarbon.click/)
Leaving this option off will help me to find any application bugs
Nothing would have been possible without this fantastic tool:
An OTA update is available for the rom, enable it in the mod settings
The AmazModService adds some features to the watch
The URL where to download data in real time
Hide the chart from the home and disable the background service
Disables the synchronization of the charge level in the background. The percentage of charge will be read only when the app is opened
It indicates how often the app in the background must connect to the watch to read the percentage of charge left
Sync interval when a notification arrives

The app each time it receives a notification tries to read the percentage of charge in order to take advantage of the connection already opened by the transmission of the notification. This is the minimum interval between one reading and the next
It indicates how many days the battery chart shows
Heart rate data for reference only

If the phone uses the MIUI system, please find and enter Security center - Permission management - Self-starting management on the phone desktop, and add the \"Amazfit Watch\" to the white list.

"Transferring files requires connection to a Wi-Fi hotspot hosted on the watch. During the transfer, your phone will not be able to connect to other Wi-Fi networks. When it's done, the watch will stop the hotspot and the phone will restore Wi-Fi connection to other newworks."
Disconnected from Hotspot on the watch, please try it again.
Please check the Wi-Fi settings of this phone.
We are all booked. Please try again later
有氧活动区间是指心率在最大心率的70-84%之间，是中高强度区间。在此区间您在努力锻炼，但没有精疲力尽。对于大多数人，这是目标锻炼区域。
燃烧脂肪区间是指心率在最大心率的50-69%，是中低强度锻炼区间，并是刚参加锻炼的新手的理想选择。该区域称为脂肪燃烧区域，这是因为很大比例的消耗卡路里来自脂肪，但是总卡路里消耗率较低。
峰值区间是指心率大于最大心率的85%，是高强度锻炼区间。峰值区间是指短时间的高强度运动，可以提高运动成绩和速度。
如果您在区间以外，即低于最大心率的50%，虽然依然测量心率，但不足以视为锻炼。
即睡觉时记录的心率数值。
心率分布区间可以帮助您针对不同的训练强度来优化锻炼。默认区间根据估测最大心率计算。我们利用常用的220减去年龄值公式计算最大心率。如下是心率区间分布说明：
